javadoc: Generates End of line comment Fields.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: model
params.comment: the model that the field belongs to.

params.name: displayOptions
params.comment: the Options for display properties.

params.name: fieldOptions
params.comment: the Options for field specific properties.

methods.name: fieldOptionsChanged

params.name: options
params.comment: options object containing the property that changed

params.name: optionName
params.comment: name of option that changed

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: old value of the option

params.name: newValue
params.comment: new value of the option

methods.name: adjustRepeatableDisplayOptions
methods.comment: Adjust the Repeatable Comment display options if the associated options changed.

params.name: options
params.comment: the Display Options object that changed.

params.name: optionName
params.comment: the name of the property that changed.

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: the old value of the property.

params.name: newValue
params.comment: the new value of the property.

methods.name: adjustRefRepeatDisplayOptions
methods.comment: Adjust the Referenced Repeatable Comments display options if the associated options changed.

params.name: options
params.comment: the Display Options object that changed.

params.name: optionName
params.comment: the name of the property that changed.

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: the old value of the property.

params.name: newValue
params.comment: the new value of the property.

methods.name: adjustAutomaticCommentDisplayOptions
methods.comment: Adjust the Automatic Comment display options if the associated options changed.

params.name: options
params.comment: the Display Options object that changed.

params.name: optionName
params.comment: the name of the property that changed.

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: the old value of the property.

params.name: newValue
params.comment: the new value of the property.

methods.javadoc: Set the max number of lines to display for EOL comments.
methods.name: setMaximumLinesToDisplay
methods.comment: Set the max number of lines to display for EOL comments.

methods.name: getProgramLocation

params.name: screenRow
params.comment: the row location for the cursor within the listing field.

params.name: screenColumn
params.comment: the column location for the cursor within the listing field.

params.name: bf
params.comment: the listing field.

return.comment: the program location that is equivalent to the cursor location in the field.

methods.name: getSingleString
methods.comment:
Convert the array of comments to a single string and use the given
 separatorChar as the delimiter.

params.name: comments
params.comment: array of comments to convert

params.name: separatorChar
params.comment: character to insert after each element in the comment array

name: EolCommentFieldFactory
comment: Generates End of line comment Fields.

fields.name: ENABLE_SHOW_SEMICOLON_MSG
fields.constant_value: "EOL Comments Field.Show Semicolon at Start of Each Line"

fields.name: ENABLE_ALWAYS_SHOW_REPEATABLE_MSG
fields.constant_value: "EOL Comments Field.Always Show the Repeatable Comment"

fields.name: ENABLE_ALWAYS_SHOW_REF_REPEATABLE_MSG
fields.constant_value: "EOL Comments Field.Always Show the Referenced Repeatable Comments"

fields.name: ENABLE_ALWAYS_SHOW_AUTOMATIC_MSG
fields.constant_value: "EOL Comments Field.Always Show the Automatic Comment"

fields.name: ENABLE_PREPEND_REF_ADDRESS_MSG
fields.constant_value: "EOL Comments Field.Prepend the Address to Each Referenced Comment"
